This ghoran manipulator relies on charm to survive. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 23 **[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 23 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18 [Ghoran Manipulator](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1164) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 106 **Perception** +9; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +11, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +9, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +9, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6 **Str** +0 **Dex** +1 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +4 **Items** [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (20 arrows), [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10) --- **AC** 18 **Fort** +8 **Ref** +8 **Will** +11 **HP** 45 **Appetizing Aroma** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 10 feet. A creature entering or starting its turn in the aura must attempt a DC 17 Will save. Creatures that don't eat are immune to Appetizing Aroma.
**Success** The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 1 hour.
**Failure** The creature is distracted by a desire to consume the ghoran. For 1 round it becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) and [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) by the ghoran manipulator.
**Delicious** Ghorans were originally created to be scrumptious food. A ghoran manipulator takes 5 additional damage from jaws Strikes, fangs Strikes, or other similar Strikes with a creature's mouth. When a ghoran manipulator is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) by a creature's jaws, fangs, or mouth, the DC to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) is increased by 2.
**Anguished Cry** ([emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Trigger** A [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) enemy damages the ghoran manipulator with a melee attack; **Effect** The ghoran manipulator rearranges its facial petals and wails, mimicking humanoid anguish to engender sympathy. The triggering creature must attempt a DC 20 Will save.
**Success** The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 1 hour.
**Failure** The target takes a –2 circumstance penalty on attack rolls against the ghoran manipulator until the start of its next turn.
**Critical Failure** As failure, and the target is [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) until the start of its next turn. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** spear +7, **Damage** 1d6+2 piercing **Ranged** spear +8 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d6+2 piercing **Ranged** shortbow +8 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6+2 piercing **Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 20 - **Cantrips (2nd)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177) - **1st** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266), [Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) (3 slots) - **2nd** [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220) (2 slots) **Primal Innate Spells** DC 20 - **1st** [Goodberry](/Spells.aspx?ID=473), [Purify Food and Drink](/Spells.aspx?ID=241) - **2nd** [Detect Poison](/Spells.aspx?ID=67)
